TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StylusPlugIn extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示可添加到控件的 属性中的插件。

span.span: Represents a plug-in that can be added to a control's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许您 在单独的线程上操作对象。The allows you to manipulate objects on separate threads. 使用单独的线程，以便即使应用程序正在执行其他操作，墨迹仍会呈现为触笔输入数据。Separate threads are used so that the ink still renders as the tablet pen inputs data even if the application is doing something else. 若要截获硬件中的触笔接触点，请创建一个从类继承的类 。To intercept stylus points from the hardware, create a class that inherits from the class. 类具有以下方法，你可以重写这些方法，以便在 笔线程池中的线程上操作对象。The class has the following methods that you can override to manipulate objects on a thread in the pen thread pool. - - - - - 笔的输入将路由到 笔线程上的元素。The pen's input is routed to an element's on the pen thread. 由于无法在触笔线程上执行准确的命中测试，某些元素可能偶尔接收到用于其他元素的触笔输入。Since accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements. 如果在执行操作之前需要确保正确路由输入，请在 、或方法中订阅并执行该操作 。If you need to make sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, subscribe to and perform the operation in the , , or method. 执行准确的命中测试后，主应用程序线程会调用这些方法。These methods are invoked by the main application thread after accurate hit-testing has been performed. 若要订阅这些方法，请 在笔线程上出现的方法中调用方法。To subscribe to these methods, call the method in the method that occurs on the pen thread. 例如，如果 在中调用 ，则 会发生。For example, if you call in , the occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 控件中使用，则应广泛测试插件和控件以确保它们不会引发任何意外的异常。If you use a inside a control, you should test the plug-in and control extensively to make sure they do not throw any unintended exceptions. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类通常不在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个自定义 ，它将墨迹约束到控件上的某个区域。The following example creates a custom that constrains the ink to a certain area on the control. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/FilterPlugin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/FilterPlugin.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存其元素的边界以执行命中测试。The caches the bounds of its element to perform hit testing. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用继承自，如何 使用 呈现笔画。The following example demonstrates how a , which inherits from , uses an to render a stroke. 此画笔部分绘制由指定的图像文件 `imageFile` 。This brush partially draws the image file specified by `imageFile`. span.span: Occurs on a thread in the pen thread pool when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法发生在笔线程上，因此最大程度地减少了此方法中的工作，以避免影响性能。This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 方法。The following example demonstrates how to override the method. 若要创建将 墨迹限制到特定区域的，请参阅 概述。To create a that restricts ink to a certain area, see the overview.
